# AwsCliLayer bundles the AWS CLI in a lambda layer
from aws_cdk.asset_awscli_v1 import ASSET_FILE, LAYER_SOURCE_DIR
import aws_cdk as lambda_
import aws_cdk as s3_assets
from aws_cdk_lib import FileSystem

# fn: lambda.Function

asset = s3_assets.Asset(self, "layer-asset",
    path=ASSET_FILE,
    asset_hash=FileSystem.fingerprint(LAYER_SOURCE_DIR)
)
fn.add_layers(lambda_.LayerVersion(self, "AwsCliLayer",
    code=lambda_.Code.from_bucket(asset.bucket, asset.s3_object_key)
))
